lyrics.text:
’Oku tau tupu ta’e hoko
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
Ka koe kakai loto hē,
Pea angahala.

Ko e tupu angakovi,
Pea ta’e’ilo
‘A e ‘Eiki angalelei,
Ko hotau ‘Otua.

Ko e kakai ongonoa,
Pea houhau’ia,
Pea mo’ua, ki he mate
Fakalaumālie.

Pea ko hono totongi,
Ki he angakovi,
Ko e mate ‘angaua,
Pea lī ki heli.
